title: What is strong acid cation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Strong Acid cation / weak acid cations and strong base anion/ weak acid anion terms are used for ion exchange resins used for demineralisation of raw water. Strong Acid cation exchange resins: polymers contains sulphonic acid group Weakly acid cation exchange resins : polymers contains carboxylic acid group Strong base anion : contains Quarter ammonium salts of polymers Weakly base anion exchange resins : polymers contains 1°,2° and 3° amine group
